original_text: Let me take my wives and my children with me. I have worked for you so that I could have them. You must let me leave, because you know how much I have worked for you.’
korean_text: 내가 외삼촌에게서 일하고 얻은 처자를 내게 주시어 나로 가게 하소서 내가 외삼촌에게 한 일은 외삼촌이 아시나이다

sentences.original_text: Let me take my wives and my children with me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 아내들과 자녀들을 데리고 가게 해 주십시오.

sentences.original_text: so that I could have them.
how much I have worked for you.
